summary: In the first volume of the .hack//Liminality series, a Japanese school girl Mai Minase and her friend Tomonari Kasumi became unconscious from playing an online computer game and was rushed ... See full summary »

title: .hack//Liminality Vol. 1: In the Case of Mai Minase
